title: President offers condolence on Amjad Islam Amjadâ€™s death
content:
LAHORE, March 4 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi and First Lady Begum Samina Alvi on Saturday visited the residence of late Amjad Islam Islam to express condolences with the bereaved family.
They offered fateha for the departed soul and prayed for the bereaved family to bear the loss with fortitude, President Secretariat Press Wing said in a press release.
The president said that late Amjad was a great Urdu poet and author and the country felt pride over such personalities, adding that his death was a loss to the nation.
